typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 106.0 && TARGET_CODE != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Business Areas',
		grp_key = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'EG', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)),
		grp_description = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'Energy+', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)),
		bua_key = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE),
		bua_description = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)) ~> DeriveTopGrpBus
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		top_key,
		top_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTop
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		top_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGrp
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		top_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBua
AggregateTop, AggregateGrp union(byName: true)~> UnionTopGrp
UnionTopGrp, AggregateBua union(byName: true)~> UnionGrpBua
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		bus_key = TARGET_CODE,
		bus_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		top_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBus
SelectBua aggregate(groupBy(bua_key),
	each(match(name!='bua_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateBua
SelectGrp aggregate(groupBy(grp_key),
	each(match(name!='grp_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateGrp
SelectTop aggregate(groupBy(top_key),
	each(match(name!='top_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateTop
UnionGrpBua, SelectBus union(byName: true)~> UnionBus
UnionBus keyGenerate(output(dimension_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddDimensionKey
AddDimensionKey split(isNull(grp_key),
	!isNull(grp_key) &&
isNull(bua_key),
	!isNull(grp_key) &&
!isNull(bua_key) &&
isNull(bus_key),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(TopLevel, GrpLevel, BuaLevel, BusLevel)
SelectGrpColumns derive(grp_id = New_dimension_key*-1,
		dimension_key = New_dimension_key*-1) ~> DeriveGrpID
SelectBuaColumns derive(bua_id = New_dimension_key*-1,
		dimension_key = New_dimension_key*-1) ~> DeriveBuaID
SelectBusColumns derive(bus_id = New_dimension_key) ~> DeriveBusID
ConditionalSplit1@TopLevel derive(top_id = dimension_key*-1,
		dimension_key = dimension_key*-1) ~> DerivedColumn2
ConditionalSplit1@GrpLevel select(mapColumn(
		New_grp_key = grp_key,
		New_dimension_key = dimension_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGrpColumns
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		top_key,
		dimension_key,
		top_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTopColumns
ConditionalSplit1@BuaLevel select(mapColumn(
		New_bua_key = bua_key,
		New_dimension_key = dimension_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBuaColumns
ConditionalSplit1@BusLevel select(mapColumn(
		New_bus_key = bus_key,
		New_dimension_key = dimension_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBusColumns
AddDimensionKey select(mapColumn(
		top_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description,
		bus_key,
		bus_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameOldDimKey
RenameOldDimKey, SelectTopColumns join(RenameOldDimKey@top_key == SelectTopColumns@top_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinTopLevels
JoinTopLevels select(mapColumn(
		dimension_key,
		top_id,
		top_key = RenameOldDimKey@top_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description,
		bus_key,
		bus_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
